errorMessage.message: Argument passed to %s() must be an instance of %s, %s given.
HTTP code "%s" is not valid. Check http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html for more informations about HTTP code.
Invalid format "%s".
Invalid HTML method "%s". Check http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec9.html for more informations about valid methods.
No valid return format found.
Remote client ip "%s" is not valid.
Invalid format "%s".
Unknown request format "%s".
Authorization header's method (%s) invalid. (should be ARS)
Missing server key variable "%s".
Invalid HTML method "%s". Check http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec9.html for more informations about valid methods.
Can't execute request: %s is not set.
Database class %s not found.
Invalid port number %s. [0-65535]
File "%s" does not exist.
Missing key %s. (%s)
Value "%s" for key "%s" invalid.
Private key "%s" is too short. [>=%s]
Private key "%s" must contains at least one lower case unicode letter.
Private key "%s" must contains at least one upper case unicode letter.
Private key "%s" must contains at least one number.
Private key "%s" must contains at least one non unicode alphanumerical character.
Accepted output format are invalid.
Invalid charset %s.
Specified output rendering class (%s) not found.
Render classe factory is not set.
Response header "%s" is invalid. Check http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html for more informations about headers.
Framework's configuration file not found. (Should be located: %s)
Key %s must be present but does not exist in the configuration.
Key %s does not exist in the configuration.
